website_summaries.verdict: A fun spin on the traditional game with a Game of Thrones theme. Ideal for teens and adults who want to jazz up parties and game nights.
pros: Comes with attractive dragon-themed pieces as well as holdfasts and castles in place of houses and hotels
Bonus item is an Iron Throne card holder music box that plays the theme song
Board covers all seven kingdoms featured in the series
cons: Coinage and money is a bit confusing

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend since he’s a huge GoT fan. I couldn’t wait to open and play it. He was super excited! I think we both were! Haha! He checked out each piece, examined the board (like a little kid explaining each place!) The coins were a nice touch. A bit confusing after awhile cos you were either very rich or very poor haha. They were pretty durable. Hard cardboard. One thing I would change is maybe adding more chance cards. We ran through all of them rather quickly. I loved the fact that they infused the GoT theme but kept the Monopoly theme. And he got a kick out of the Throne and the music box.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: 2 different games missing deck of cards
customer_reviews.text: Ordered game was so excited to open it up but it was missing the deck of cards.. so returned and reordered just got it yesterday and the deck of cards is missing yes AGAIN.... extremely disappointed, we are having a GoT watch party and was planning on playing but now we can’t!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Box arrived sealed with missing pieces AND cards. Looked awesome, but was very disappointed when I went to play with my family and couldn’t as there were no cards.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee Lemieux

customer_reviews.title: Came opened and missing cards.
customer_reviews.text: Box came opened and taped back shut with the entire deck of cards missing.
customer_reviews.author: Mom/Auntie

customer_reviews.title: House Monopoly wins! A++
customer_reviews.text: Monopoly has done it again with the GOT set! I especially love the music box that comes with the theme music. The set is a nice quality and captures the theme nicely with the locations, house tokens and mini iron throne! It was fun to play!
customer_reviews.author: rachael w.

customer_reviews.title: The cards are there!!
customer_reviews.text: Seen a bunch of people complain the cards aren’t in the box.... they’re under the sound box. Great game though
customer_reviews.author: MomOf4

customer_reviews.title: Missing cards!
customer_reviews.text: Two of the title deed cards are missing! Extremely disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Ralitsa

customer_reviews.title: Great Game for the GOT and Monopoly Fan!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend who is a huge GOT fan and Monopoly fan. We opted for this version over the $45+ version because of cost and could not be happier! The properties are great nods to the show and the “Chance” cards can be COMPLETE game changers (read: can be savage like show). A particular card can decide the fate of the entire game; this is one reason we did not give a 5 star rating. The quality of pieces, board and overall appearance is great and we would recommend this! Note: this game tends to run faster than the traditional.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: So fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this game for our house hold and it is so much fun to play with friends. Because this is Game of Thrones style, it can be pretty ruthless so the game will not go on forever LOL
customer_reviews.author: Goldmallow

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: This game is so much fun. Obviously it has all of the Game of Thrones elements that make it super cool, but the chance cards are absolutely savage and make Game play a ton of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Alyconn

customer_reviews.title: Cards in the packaging
customer_reviews.text: Amazing game and I would recommend it for all the fans of the show but I am giving 4 stars because of the packaging. As there is an empty slot inside the box and the cards are actually under the music box in a hidden slot. I though I got a defective piece without the cards for few days until I called the customer support .
customer_reviews.author: Bhanu Prakash Goteti

customer_reviews.title: Super Fun
customer_reviews.text: Love that it has music and the game pieces are fun.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Need game especially for GOT fans
customer_reviews.text: Such a cool buy! It has a button on it that allows you to play the theme song. The only problem is my step son loves to press it too much!
customer_reviews.author: Christie Hall

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for a child of a friend of my moms. He is Autistic and loved it. So excited.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Husband loved it
customer_reviews.text: Gave it to my husband as part of his Valentine's Day gift and he loved it.
customer_reviews.author: hnicole89

customer_reviews.title: Missing cards
customer_reviews.text: Missing entire deck of Chance/community chest cards. Super disappointing. Now we have to return it and can’t play it tonight on Season 8 premiere day! 😞😞😞
customer_reviews.author: Baby Sloth

customer_reviews.title: Bend the knee
customer_reviews.text: Box arrived new as expected. I wish the throne was metal but it’s a plastic mold. Pretty cool how it plays the theme song! FYI, the hollow section of the tray is for the coins and the card deck is behind the speaker. I don’t know how people quickly right a review and complain without taking all the pieces out of the box!
customer_reviews.author: E. Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Best Monopoly Yet!
customer_reviews.text: If you’re a GOT fan, you’ll love this! But it’s actually really enjoyable to play!!! The coins make game play a lot more fun. I own a few themed Monopoly’s and this is my favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Christy E

customer_reviews.title: GoT Monoply Fun
customer_reviews.text: This is your classic monoply game however it is Game of Thrones themed. A few minor differences, the money is simplified to gold and silver coins (makes banking easier) - there's no special rule with the game, however there's a theme song throne that can be played and paused when you want. Something different from the regular rules are the chance cards - different types of cards that are not your typical cards. Overall fun game and crowd pleaser!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Fun twist on a classic but not without flaws
customer_reviews.text: I especially like that “Chance” and “Community Chest” are replaced to include just “Chance” and have “hold until useful” cards that can swing the game dramatically. It reminds me of surprising plot twists in the show. I don’t love the monetary system-gold dragon=5, silver stag=1- or the breakdown of pricing. Basically, this uber-simplified bank where $1 is so valuable renders the lower-cost properties obsolete pretty early on. Think playing regular Monopoly with only $100 and $500 bills along with a price scheme to match. Either the higher-cost properties remain out of reach for the majority of the game, or the lower-cost ones become a joke nearly immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick H.

customer_reviews.title: I can't say enough good things about this game!
customer_reviews.text: We had a wonderful time playing this version of Monopoly. Because it's less like monopolies than other monopolies. It fits the theme not only in look but in the way you play it. It has additional elements which can really shift the game on a dime. The playing pieces are awesome the music element is awesome the throne is awesome. It plays more like a European game than an American one. I'm so pleased with the value of this game it's totally worth the price. If you like the series you will really enjoy playing this game. It's theme elements are right on target. The chance cards really makes it up. A lot of fun for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for GOT fans
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t sure how they would integrate Game Of Thrones into Monopoly but we had a blast playing. Each time an event card was pulled we started to hit the music box because some of them are ruthless! If you love GoT this is a must have board game. I was only disappointed because the pieces are plastic but I’m willing to overlook it because it was worth the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Unsaintly

customer_reviews.title: Thought "wow cool" until we played
customer_reviews.text: We were excited to try this GOT Monopoly at first. Not impressed with paper coins and players don't get enough to start, much less invest in property. By the time properties are bought your broke in two trips around the board. The game ends just as it gets started. We adjusted the amount of coins, doubled the "pass go" amount. Tough to get out of jail if you don't increase the coins at the start. The rules are a lil different but easy to understand. The chance cards are kinda lame and repetitive. Though not totally impressed, with a few minor adjustments it's ok. We thought instead of "jail" they should have made it a dungeon.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Fox

customer_reviews.title: Great twist on the game. Better than the classic
customer_reviews.text: OMGGGG. Played this the other night upon delivery, such a fun game! The use of coins is so much easier to play with vs having a ton of paper bills but makes the gap between the wealthiest and poorest even more difficult to close. Great touch! Best part of this game are the random twists in the chance deck. We had 2 major upsets and both times were shocked but also had so much fun. Highly recommend. My only grievance is the house siglis are made super cheap and it’s really hard to tell them apart when 6 people play. I’ll be painting them w nail polish for future games.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Item was damaged pretty badly
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful variation of Monopoly and the quality of the game pieces are admirable...however, the unit i received was badly damaged. As shown, the top left corner of the box is in very bad shape. Its as if someone willfully slammed it on the ground or it fell out of a moving car. The impact even made a dent on the inside centerpiece that holds the game pieces. Luckily, the game itself isn't damaged and I don't care much about my board games being in pristine condition but to a collector, this would've been an easy return. Buy with caution
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: I bought this despite the reviews that mentioned the low quality.. hoping that people just had high expectations. But nope, the quality couldn't get any lower than this. I have Monopoly Deluxe (from more than 15 yrs ago) and the quality doesn't compare. Such disappointment. While I am excited to play this got version, I wouldn't be surprised if the game pieces started to rust/break/rip in a few weeks. I recommend this if you're in for sentimental value.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: The game box was torn
customer_reviews.text: Game seems really cool. Somewhat different than normal monopoly . I did not like though the fact that the actual game box was torn all the way through on them bottom. Appears it may have been done in manufacture prepping for shipping because outside of Amazon brought wasn't torn at all. A little disappointed because this is the box the game is in and it wasn't in tact.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves GoT, so I bought this for him for Christmas. Gameplay is similar to all Monopoly games, my only disappointment was that we are missing several property cards from our set. It's hard to guess the value or make up cards when missing some from a brand new set, so while we can still play, it's just disappointing not all the cards were included. Only 3 stars because it was missing 2 orange property cards.
customer_reviews.author: husband0924

customer_reviews.title: Fans will love it. Great twist on the original.
customer_reviews.text: Everyone absolutely loves it! No community chest just all chance cards and some are secret cards - quite evil I might add (steal an entire set from an opponent including castles, make an opponent pay rent on all 3 properties in the set including castles if any). Cards are held in the iron throne. Currency are only 2 types of coins representing 1 or 5 (silver and gold). Game goes by quick with 3 people. True Game of Thrones style game. Very cut-throat. Even if you’ve never seen an episode of GOT you’ll enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply made--we returned it
customer_reviews.text: Whose bright idea was it to design a board that's divided into quarters, and when unfolded doesn't lie flat and whose quarters don't line up? Not only that, it's thin and insubstantial. How hard would it have been to stick with a Monopoly board divided in half that had some more weight to it?
customer_reviews.author: Viking2020

customer_reviews.title: Fun take on Monopoly game for GOT fans
customer_reviews.text: We have not had a chance to play the game yet, buy my grandson hit a "sound" button and it plays the theme from the show Game of Thrones.... LOVE that. Looking forward to when we can sit down and play. I bought two of them -- each costing under $15 so I am please that it is a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Therese

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete
customer_reviews.text: Had to return this game. There were no chance or property cards. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Janet S. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Check your purchase
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like the perfect gift to give a GOT fan who also enjoys Monopoly. Purchased this as soon as it was available but was not opened until recently (as I enjoy collecting items and keeping them sealed) until I read some reviews stating that the cards were missing. Lo and behold, there are no chance cards in the box. The game is effectively useless and now worthless. Seems like a major gaffe to be easily avoided with a little quality control and using the included checklist.
customer_reviews.author: J. C. Branche

customer_reviews.title: monopoly game of thrones
customer_reviews.text: love this version of the game. very easy to play and it takes shorter time to play, just when you think you are broke, bang people start landing on properties and you are rich. the only thing we did was go ten of each coins.
customer_reviews.author: wsj

customer_reviews.title: It's a lot of fun
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful, colorful game and the box plays the Theme from Game of Thrones. The negative was that a small section of the colorful, musical box had a small piece torn out of it as though it was whacked in transit. That's why I gave it three stars for giftable. Had it not been damaged I could easily have given as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: JSW

customer_reviews.title: Missing items!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: MISSING CARDS!!!!!!!!! There’s so many reviews of people receiving the box with missing cards and I was sadly one of them!!! Don’t buy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cardboard box
customer_reviews.text: Was slightly disappointed with this item. From the look of ot , I THOUGHT it came in a tin container but it's a flimsy cardboard box. I only paid the amount I did because I thought it was something I could keep for years. I probably can but have to treat it very carefully.
customer_reviews.author: JC Williams

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal!
customer_reviews.text: Great game! Great price! I’ve seen this game in stores for $60. The pawns are real metal. The only downside is currency. They use coins like in game of thrones not money and there’s only 2 coin values which makes it harder. I would definitely recommend more than 2 players. Game goes by quick with only 2 players and not as fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GoT Monopoly
customer_reviews.text: Definitely is a great gift to anyone who wants all of the diff monopoly games or a GoT fan. I love board games and GoT but I gotta say, I was a little disappointed in this. I felt it was lacking and the money they put into the sound box (which has no use during the game, other than to sit on the board) and put a little more thought into the pieces and money.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Can’t wait to play it!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so excited for this. Got it for myself for Christmas. I love Monopoly and Game of Thrones. I am not able to open it do to me needing to wait for Christmas. But I posted the video of the sound and it sounds great. The box it’s really exciting I can’t wait to play it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: They absolutely loved the gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my niece's birthday. She is a HUGE GOT fan. She was so excited over this she couldn't wait to get back to college and play with her roommates. She even sent me a picture of them all playing the game saying that everyone loved it. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Game Night
customer_reviews.text: I only own unique edition monopoly games, so when I saw this, I knew I had to get it because my hubby and I are such GOT fans. I haven't played it yet, but I was so surprised when I received it that it plays the theme song, I cant wait to play with it.
customer_reviews.author: JL8

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts.
customer_reviews.text: This is missing the CHANCE cards. It is a Christmas present so I didn’t open it until last week and discovered the cards were missing. Ugh!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ruthless fun
customer_reviews.text: Great fun, plays way faster than traditional monopoly thanks to the different chance cards, I only wish the coins used for money were made of plastic
customer_reviews.author: David M

customer_reviews.title: Updated review!
customer_reviews.text: So, I initially thought I recieved my game missing the deck of cards. I called Hasbro and apparantly the cards are hidden under the speaker box I wasn't even planning on removing from the box and they are black and difficult to see. So for others who also thought they were missing, check under the speaker box. Other than poor packaging, this game looks like a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: Good monopoly variant.
customer_reviews.text: It is a surprisingly good version of monopoly. There are fewer money bills and it plays better than the traditional version. Perhaps the payoffs are better aligned to produce a faster game. And the GOT theme is a bonus
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shipped Just as Shown
customer_reviews.text: Again, got this for a Christmas gift for my younger brother and his wife which are both huge table top game fans and also Game of Thrones fans. Game professionally wrapped, no dents or scuffs. Just as we hoped when making this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Coffey

customer_reviews.title: Amazing gift for a GOT lover.
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend was over the moon about this. Him and his friends had the best time playing! I saw a few negative reviews, but this came with all it's parts and no dents! The theme song button is a nice touch. Great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Returning  because missing the cards
customer_reviews.text: Received the game without the cards needed to play it. Returning it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: DocN

customer_reviews.title: Warped Game Board
customer_reviews.text: Components were fine, but the board needs serious re-tooling. Upon opening it was bowed and doesn't sit flush with the playing surface. The Iron Throne was made out of iron...the game board should have been made out of material a bit thicker than what it is. The North Remembers...Monopoly.
customer_reviews.author: DesolateBaker70

customer_reviews.title: Get the Chance cards
customer_reviews.text: It goes by faster than regular monopoly. It’s more difficult to get an entire monopoly and there’s a lot of trump cards. It adds a different dynamic to the game. The chance cards go according to the GOT style. A lot of stealing but also a bit repetitive. Otherwise it’s still very enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Noe Barrera

customer_reviews.title: Chance cards really can change the game!
customer_reviews.text: Board warped on one panel. Cheap cardboard folding 4 panel board. Box plays theme music over and over. Would be nice if there were a few different tracts that played. Maybe audio tracts from characters?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Handled Product
customer_reviews.text: Game box came completely smashed (shipping box and other items in box no issues). Unable to give as a gift now! No option to replace refund only! Game is nice for GOT fan we will keep it for ourselves vs the person who it was a gift for and find one new condition to gift.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Triggs

customer_reviews.title: Great for Game of Thrones fans!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband who is a huge Monopoly and Game of Thrones fan. It is actually a lot of fun, and the detail is great! We had a blast playing with some friends around Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Dimarie86

customer_reviews.title: Check under music box for missing deck.
customer_reviews.text: It arrived in the mail yesterday! Very Beautiful. At first I thought I was missing pieces, since the spot next to the music box was empty. When I lifted the music box I found the deck hidden under. One side held the properties, the other showed the chance cards. Im still going to count them to make sure they're all there. No community chest cards for this game. Can't wait to actually play it.
customer_reviews.author: Mirsa B.

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve just read the reviews and I got worried about missing pieces. At first when I opened the box my initial thought was “something is missing” but checking carefully everything seems intact and deck of cards was placed behind the music box. So glad it was all there :)
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Monopoly Game of Thrones Board Game
customer_reviews.text: The game is great. Its doesn't take as much time as a regular Monopoly game to play. My only disappointment was that it only came with Card board coins for money. I bought plastic coins for it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Landon

customer_reviews.title: Altered the currency, ruins gameplay. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely did not like the way they changed the Monopoly money into coins and reduced the currency value to 1-2 coins. Makes no sense and ruined gameplay. It’s now sitting on my shelf taking up space. Do not recommend- not even for the singing throne.
customer_reviews.author: Sara W.

customer_reviews.title: It was fun, but....
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad that we brought this product because it put a new Twist on a really fun game. My only feedback is that it's a little weird with the money situation and my box arrived damaged.
customer_reviews.author: RElli2002

customer_reviews.title: Great game to play
customer_reviews.text: We play these so much it works great and such a fun Version to play. It’s is well worth the price we paid for the fun we have. My 6 year old even plays it. It may even be better bc it doesn’t have all the money with it! The best part is it’s durable and nothing cheaply made!
customer_reviews.author: Lia Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Okay...
customer_reviews.text: The game is the game. The electronic part only does a snip of the theme song, nothing more. My game box and inside tray came seriously damaged. The insides were okay. The delivery box was perfect. So this was packaged and sent, damaged. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey F.

customer_reviews.title: She Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my sister's birthday and because she is a big GOT fan. She takes it out when she has her friends over and when they is a family get together. We have fun and love the theme song.
customer_reviews.author: EllieO

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: It’s beautiful. Advertised properly. Bought it for Christmas for my brother and haven’t used it yet unfortunately but it was a gift he loved. Moreso used as a display item.
customer_reviews.author: Riley Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Great collectors item.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mum's birthday, she absolutely loves the game! Pieces were all there, the button on the game is part of the iron throne assemble and plays the wholeeee song. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Hailee Babyyy

customer_reviews.title: Hear me Roar
customer_reviews.text: It was a Christmas gift for my sister and I gave it to her already. We all LOVED it! We played in 6 players and we had a blast. Everything about it is great. Just can’t wait for the next round. Hear me Roar!
customer_reviews.author: Raluca

customer_reviews.title: Cards hidden under music box
customer_reviews.text: after receiving the game with seemingly no cards, I contacted hasbro and was informed that they are under the music box and not in the space next to the music box. 10/10 bamboozle
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: Great product, came with everything, presentation was nice!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, came with everything, presentation was nice! I got it as a gift but unfortunately, I returned it because I was unable to give it to the intended person, as they are no longer in my life.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Parke

customer_reviews.title: A must have if you are a GOT fan!
customer_reviews.text: Great board game! Love the musical effect. The game is the same as a regular Monopoly game plus “GOT effects” including the music! Great gift idea if you know someone who loves GOT!
customer_reviews.author: MzBataan

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Really wasn't worth the money. Uses coins instead of money, the usual change of streets, but the biggest waste was hitting a button to hear the theme song. It does absolutely nothing else.. Novelty item only. I'd send it back if I didn't open it.
customer_reviews.author: D. DEGENOVA

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift for my wife who collects monopoly games. She loves the pieces, the castles, the gold and silver coins, and the box plays the theme song. Perfect for monopoly lovers and game of thrones fans.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Whoop whoop
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend for Christmas. I gave it to her early and she loved it. It looks super fun. I love that it places the music it’s a great touch to it. I was able to purchases this well it was on sale for $13.99 and it was definitely worth it
customer_reviews.author: charlene

customer_reviews.title: Monopoly game of thrones
customer_reviews.text: this product is a bad example of how chinese products can be in reality. The packaging is good but other than that all the materials inside the packagae are made out of cheap plastic and the board is half the size of the game of thrones monopoly set fro usapoly. i personally have both and i would prefer the USApoly monopoly for game of thrones any day.
customer_reviews.author: Blaze

customer_reviews.title: Just plain fun and nicely done!
customer_reviews.text: Best price thru Amazon. Great remake of the Monopoly Game with a few differences. Playing pieces are fun and expect a new challenge to the original game.
customer_reviews.author: nan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, but...
customer_reviews.text: Love this version of the board game. The first one was amazing but this is truly spectacular. Unfortunately, when I opened the box that contained my product it (GoT Monopoly) was already opened. The pieces weren't missing so that left me at ease but the box is now damaged as seen in the pictures. Not too much but really a cringe to know someone opened it. In the second picture where the sealant is you can see that the box is ripped and that really sucks. Would have put five stars if that wasn't the case.
customer_reviews.author: William Soto

customer_reviews.title: Missing cards twice....
customer_reviews.text: Missing cards in game. Put in a return drop off at Kohl's and got a replacement game two days later with the same missing cards. Now waiting for another replacement game since I chose Kohl's drop off again. Now been over a week of just waiting for a response.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Split
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to receive this board game but upon inspection, I realized the board was split into four pieces. I don’t know if this is just the way the board is suppose to be but it reduced the number of stars given...all in all it was 16 bucks or so, I will live with it. Nothing a little tape can’t fix.
customer_reviews.author: S.A.

customer_reviews.title: Fun Game
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun take on an old classic. Great for you if you are a Game of Thrones fan. My adult daughter likes to play and she does not watch Game of Thrones. Game goes by quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Parris

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The game box was ripped. The UPS shipping box was in good condition; therefore, the game box was already ripped before packing it. Very irresponsible!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Not bad at all. Actually love that there are only the two coins to deal with. No worrying about all that paper money : ) really great game. House Stark Rules!!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting this game to be classier than it its. Material choices were not great, some items don't look well-finished. Because this is based on such a complex fictional universe, the game plot could've been improved.
customer_reviews.author: Hodric

customer_reviews.title: Love the theme!
customer_reviews.text: The theme is so fun! The game is so fun! Only thing that i didn't like about it the coins are made from hard papers! It could have made by plastic or silicons which will look much better
customer_reviews.author: Brandon-Yanki Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: Gift for son. He loved it. Family played Christmas day and we liked it more than the original monopoly. Easy to follow play and rules. Recommend to GoT fans who like board games.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I played the theme song over and over again
customer_reviews.text: My husband was so impressed with this gift for Father’s Day. He is a big fan of GOT and to have a monopoly game with the music was a absolute treat .
customer_reviews.author: vanessa owens

customer_reviews.title: So awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is a great game for a GOT and Monopoly fan. I'm a die hard Monopoly player and love me some Game Of Thrones so my daughter getting this for me was a perfect gift!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Monopoly and GOT fans!
customer_reviews.text: Super cool! Got this as a present for my girlfriend after we finished watching the series. We both love the game! It plays a little different from most versions of monopoly (only chance cards, some of them are a little too good) but it’s a nice change of pace. The game comes with great packaging too. Was skeptical of the cardboard coins but they seem pretty durable. All in all, if you love monopoly and GOT, or even if you just collect monopoly games, this is a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Evan Bakota

customer_reviews.title: The original version is way better.
customer_reviews.text: The older version of game of thrones monopoly is so much better. The game pieces are much nicer and unique, and the currency is more aligned with other monopoly games.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looked used
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this game. It was for my son for his birthday. When i took it out of the box it looked used. The edges were worn and there was a sticker on the box that shouldn't have been there. I opened it to see the inside and it seemed ok. It was all sealed. Just disappointing to give as a gift when it looks used.
customer_reviews.author: michele casetta

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for any GoT fan!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome rendition of Monopoly! It plays the theme song too. Updating to say: my husband opened and the cards are missing. Disappointed, but will be contacting customer service for cards.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Very fun!
customer_reviews.text: Huge fan of Game of Thrones. This was definitely different than I expected, but not in a bad way. Fun game to play with fellow GoT fans!
customer_reviews.author: Meighan Flynn

customer_reviews.title: What a great game
customer_reviews.text: Being stuck at home become fun when you can play at this game. I know the traditional Monopoly game but this version is really cool even if you haven’t seen the Game of throne show. Definitely recommend this product 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Manon

customer_reviews.title: If you enjoy Monopoly and Game of Thrones this is the game for you.
customer_reviews.text: Classic Monopoly but for the family who loves game of thrones. Play as your favorite house and move through the thrones landscape. The board and chance cards make you feel like you can been King of the North. So much fun!
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My husbands favorite board game is monopoly. His favorite show is GOT so this is the perfect gift idea! I did not know it played music as well which makes it even better! I cannot wait until he sees this!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Damaged box
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving this as a Christmas present, so I was disappointed when I opened the shipping box and saw that the game box had a whole in it and was smashed on one of the corners. If I send it back, I won’t get a new on in time for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: The beat
customer_reviews.text: Love! Our favorite game to take to friends houses, it’s so much better than normal monopoly. Great quality! Good for a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Brytne

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Made a great Christmas gift for GOT fan, didn't get to play it myself but they were super stoked for it.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Made Xmas Memorable
customer_reviews.text: This was a big hit at Christmas with the fam and boyfriend. This was gifted from me to my boyfriend and he had such a blast and ended up winning. The whole family is obsessed with GoT so this was an obvious choice for a memorable Christmas. There may or may not have been some adult hot chocolate involved.
customer_reviews.author: bailey berry

customer_reviews.title: GOT Monopoly is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I collect Monopoly games and this one is fabulous it even has an iron throne!! Can't wait to play it...
customer_reviews.author: H. J. Blaske

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: My younger sister received this as a Christmas present she is a huge GOT fan she loved the Monopoly game
customer_reviews.author: charles rowland

customer_reviews.title: Cool, but the money system is a little off.
customer_reviews.text: Great game to bring out once in a while, but the money system is a little funky. Some of the chance/community chest cards are very GOT themed. We had lots of fun. Makes a good drinking game.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: Coins are cheap
customer_reviews.text: Coins are cheap and the rent is there same as the properties cost
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Garfinkel

product_meta.title: Monopoly Game of Thrones Board Game for Adults
product_meta.description:
Game of Thrones meets the fast-dealing property trading game in this Monopoly game for got fans. The game board, packaging, tokens, money, chance cards, and game pieces are all inspired by the popular TV series from Hbo. Move around the board buying as many game of Thrones properties as you can. The more you own, the more rent you can collect from opponents. The last one with money when all other players have gone bankrupt, wins. The game of Thrones Monopoly game makes a great gift for enthusiasts of the show.
official HBO licensed product Copyright 2018 Home box office, Inc. All Rights Reserved. Hbo and related trademarks are the property of home box office, Inc.
feature_bullets: Based on the hit TV series from HBO: Game of Thrones fans can travel the legendary lands of Westeros as you buy, sell, and trade locations from the seven Kingdoms in this edition of the Monopoly game
Great houses game tokens: The 6 Monopoly game tokens are inspired by the Honorary sigils of the great houses; who will you pledge your loyalty to?
Game of Thrones themed money and graphics: Includes 42 gold Dragon and 53 silver stags cardboard Coins, and the game board and box feature graphics inspired by the Hbo TV show game of Thrones
Holdfasts and castles: This version of the Monopoly game includes 32 holdfasts and 12 castles in place of houses and hotels, and the properties are locations from the TV show
Game of Thrones theme song: Features iron throne card holder with a musical stand that plays the game of Thrones theme song; press the button on the stand to play it
To find cards make sure to lift up the music box, The cards are packed in a well underneath.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars2,970 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
